pullrequest.title: Remove manual setting of flags for dynamic linking of the Windows CRT library

content.raw:
I think they're triggered, but Jenkins is not able to set the commit status for forks.

Homebrew and Ubuntu are also ok:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/209/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/11/
